info.author: Gustavo Niemeyer
info.description:
That's a tool to rename files with the help of regular expressions. It allows
one to replace parts of filenames and/or directories, rename them completely,
remove files which match a given pattern, change the case of them, use help
of external programs, and more.
info.name: remv
info.html_description: That’s a tool to rename files with the help of regular expressions. It allows one to replace parts of filenames and/or directories, rename them completely, remove files which match a given pattern, change the case of them, use help of external programs, and more.
